raw_text:
Figure 5-83 Tuning – XPDR/TCAS Control

The XPDR/TCAS Control submenu provides advanced controls to modify XPDR/TCAS settings. The XPDR/TCAS Control menu is accessed by selecting the gray XPDR TCAS button on the Tuning format.

SELECTIONS:

CODE Set the transponder code by positioning the cursor over the CODE window and using the DSK. The outer knob sets the ﬁrst two digits of the ATC code, and the inner knob sets the last two digits.

5th Edition 5-140 02 APR 19
